trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents errors that occur during application execution.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx $$xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx Xxxxxx Xxxxx$ xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a collection of key/value pairs that provide additional user-defined information about the exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx$xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx$xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets a link to the help file associated with this exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx x xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The Uniform Resource Name (URN) or Uniform Resource Locator (URL).

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx Xxxxxxx Xxxxxxxx Xxxx $XXX$ xx Xxxxxxx Xxxxxxxx Xxxxxxx $XXX$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets HRESULT, a coded numerical value that is assigned to a specific exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx XXXXXXX$ x xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a message that describes the current exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the name of the application or the object that causes the error.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the application or the object that causes the error.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a string representation of the immediate frames on the call stack.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A string that describes the immediate frames of the call stack.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates and returns a string representation of the current exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A string representation of the current exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
